testimonials.name: John D.
testimonials.title: Life-changing Results
testimonials.content: The Sapphire FUE procedure exceeded my expectations. The team was professional and supportive throughout.

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.title: Amazing Natural Results
testimonials.content: The stem cell treatment was perfect for my needs. Minimal downtime and great results.
